title: Nude?
content:
Any typophiles remixing Radiohead’s Nude? Just curious...

[http://radioheadremix.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119161633/http:/radioheadremix.com/ "http://radioheadremix.com/")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: That wold be hugely fun to do. But I am not. They question must be also - are you?
if i had garage band and any talent i’d try... but no. but i figgered there must be some music types here on typophile.

I’m definitely thinking about it. It’s mainly a question if we (my musical companion and I) find the time. I’ll post it here, if we get something done.

By the way, our “normal” music can be heard at [www.myspace.com/esperspace](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119161633/http:/www.myspace.com/esperspace "www.myspace.com/esperspace") if someone’s interested. Not much typography there though… ;-)
